p4a.image
=========

Overview
--------

The *p4a.image* package provides a framework for handling image content on
the Zope 2 and Zope 3 platforms.  It was inspired by the Plone ATPhoto
product its sibling p4a products.

Developer Notes
---------------

Maintainer
----------

David Siedband (technique at occeanicsky dot com) is the active maintainer of the
*p4a.image* framework.
